item.title: End of 2019
item.description: Not a great year in my book. 2019 brought the passing of my father and my only living grandmother. My Dad before his time, and well, my grandmother, she was 96. Wow! I’m ready for a New Year. I’m ready for 2019 to be behind me. I’m ready for 2020 and to get hammering on all sorts of projects. Rides, Runs, Mountains, Art, Botany, Work. Its the beginning of a new decade of life for me here at the tail end of the year as well.

item.title: First Post
item.description: Trying another hugo static site generation template. Maybe I will actually do some blogging this time around. Who knows. I never seem to find the time though.

item.title: A Brief Bio
item.description: I’ve worked in companies ranging from tiny seed funded startups to the worlds largest telecoms, ISP’s and media companies. I’ve been a principal level technical contributor and have often moved into leadership roles from there based on organizational need. Several times I have been a direct report to the C-Suite whether it was the CEO, CTO or COO. I’ve had a lot of great mentors. I try to be a good mentor as often as the opportunity presents itself.
